results.name: Legendre symbol (n,13).
comment: Since 13 is an odd prime, this is the same as the Jacobi symbol (n,13). - _Robert Israel_, Jun 29 2017
reference: G. H. Hardy and E. M. Wright, An Introduction to the Theory of Numbers. 3rd ed., Oxford Univ. Press, 1954, p. 68.
